children.text: While the player is touching the screen, make the cursor follow the touch.
Touching the screen makes the cursor go to touch position instantly.
When the cursor finishes recharging, set its animation as ready.
When the player releases the touch, spawn a fruit, start recharging the cursor and update next fruit.
Increase player's score.
If a merge has just happened, this merge is worth BONUS_MULT times its normal value.
